name: bafflingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to understand or explain: Jake wanted us to play his new board game with him, but we found the rules to be bafflingly complicated. My sister and I each followed the recipe to the letter, yet somehow we ended up with bafflingly different results.
More examplesFewer examplesThe house was bafflingly designed, with three doors leading to the outside but none of them facing the street. Bafflingly, the police never questioned the man even though he seemed to know a lot of details about the murders.How could a movie with so many talented actors and a promising script be so bafflingly dull?
